overview: Segregated, highly surveilled, heavily filmed and intensely guarded: H2 uncovers the ways in which a single neighborhood in Hebron fuels the entire Israeli-Palestinian conflict. 54 years of military occupation, told through the story of a one-kilometer long street.
tagline: How a one-kilometer long street in Hebron fuels the entire Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
title: H2: The Occupation Lab
